June 38, 1961
Kiss Loontine Hits Keen©
Director, ,Radio-TV Publicity
Wayne State University
Detroit 2, Michigan
Dear Miss Keane*
W© ere sending you under separate oover forty copies (fewer
quantities of some items) of NAEB promotion materials as
directed by Elmer Bulser, chairman of the KAEB Public Relations
Committee. These are for distribution at your workshops, "TV
Studio Operations** and "TV Production-Direction, ** June 26-
August 5.
Thank you very much for cooperating in this.
Sincerely,
(Mrs.) Betty MoKensle
Publications Editor
